name: The Monster Within (Anna)
description:
THE MONSTER WITHIN

Made in ~5 days for Dani's Basement Game Jam

This is a action platformer game where you can steal enemies' powers and use them to your advantage to complete levels

CREDITS CODE

All code was written by me.

ART

All of the 'art' in this game was done by me

AUDIO

Music - https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-music-pack-loopable

Sound Effects - Produced by me using SFXR
